channel.title: Minor front page tweak
channel.description: Hi Just a small idea I had for hubi - the slideshow part where we get 6 thumbnails is cool, but at least over here in NZ, takes a moment to load. While it is doing so, that area shows some text reading "JavaScript must be enabled", which it is, which is kinda confusing at first. If you chuck some <noscript> tags around that text, then it would just be a blank area till the pics load, or if someone has JS off, then the message will show as needed. Almost thought this too small to mention, but since it's so quick to fix, figured I might as well... hope it's helpful.
